attributes.review:
so i had VERY high expectations when downloading the app and i thought all would go well, HOWEVER i quickly realized all was NOT going well. to start off the app took SEVERAL long PAINSTAKING hours to download and if that wasn’t BAD ENOUGH it had the AUDACITY to erase ALL of my data from my phone :( 

THATS NOT ALL!

when i thought everything couldn’t get WORSE it did...the creator of the app turned out to be a HORRIBLE person. they even have the NERVE to take down one of the BEST social platforms! THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS

anyways i hope this review helped you! 
✨🤩🧚‍♀️💞
attributes.title: HELP THIS IS BAD

attributes.review: I looked forward to supporting my hawtie Cheeto man through this app, but was beyond disappointed to see that it was affirming that “Trump 2020” is meant for his re-election and not his gravestone. 😔 My mistake, but it’s still his fault for running and thinking Gen Z was going to let him defile democracy and basic human rights once more. 😌😌
attributes.title: Absolutely Unprofessional

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app it somehow hacked into my chase account and emptied my savings and checking accounts and now I have to live off food stamps because no one will believe me or fight the president. This app quite literally ruined my life. All I have left is my phone.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app it has been a glitching my phone I really don’t really recommend it they even try to hack my account and I think this is very unsafe and unprofessional so please avoid yourself from downloading this app is the worst thank you😳
attributes.title: Don’t download this app🤡

attributes.review: The app took about 2 hours to download I went on app to only discover that there was a big orange Cheeto 🙊 .  I almost passed out just by looking at a big ugly Cheeto and it also hurt my eyes so much and now I never want to look at this this app ever again so never download this app cuz it will horrify you.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😡🤬

attributes.review: This app just crashes EVERYTIME I OPEN IT. There is just no point downloading this, if it’s just going to close😡. Not just that but it started sending messages to my friends So yeah IT HACKED MY PHONE and somehow connected to my tinder and got me a date, then hacked my gps and took me to her house and NOW I HAVE AND STI. All thanks to this app. Do NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.userName: barron j trump (who is a barb)
attributes.review: absolutely terrible app. I got kidnapped and they started calling me a pizza, even though I wasn’t hungry!😡they also gave me a circumcision but for some reason that wasn’t enough so they just cut off my entire ween! strangely enough, the pizza that we had last night was sausage, but I hate sausage and they know that🍕⛩
attributes.title: IT TOOK MY FACE AND FED IT TO BARRON TRUMP

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! It hacked my phone on a whole new level!😡 the loading screen was unprofessional, it showed a large Oompa Loompa looking man saying racial slurs. As I tried to Undownload my phone started to glitch red, white and blue until it completely BROKE. I will be speaking to someone about getting me a new phone. I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: this app is terrible i downloaded it to see what the hype was about. Five minutes later it crashed and it started making my whole phone glitch. I then kept getting threatening notifications from the app saying to vote for trump 2020 or else he would cut my check in half. CANCEL THIS APP YALL.
attributes.title: CANCEL TRUMP😡😡😡

attributes.review: My phone keeps glitching when I’m playing a game and when I’m face time my mom . And then when I barely turn on my phone,notifications are completely full like then at the night a get a virus 17 times like stop sending to much stuff like why. #blacklivesmatter
attributes.title: The WORST app EVER
